~~REDACTED~~ and any other Star Warrior who can see this post - I am now convinced this is probably how George Lucas came up with Star Wars Episode I. There's over a thousand pages of this stuff, and it's updated every Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday so I recommend using my "super awesome load-it-up page".

If this one is too slow, either hack it or slow your reading pace or let it load for about three minutes.
